1 Bubba Parham

Position Guard

Weight 165

Hometown Snellville, Ga.

Previous School Brookwood HS

Twitter bubbap_3

Instagram bubbaparham

Bio

Stats

Biography

2022 Preseason All-SoCon

2022-23 (Senior): Played in 32 games, earning the starting nod 31 times … logged a team-high 944 total minutes for an average of 29.5 per contest … averaged 9.6 points 3.2 rebounds, and 2.6 assists per game … knocked down a team-high 60 three-pointers on 154 attempts for an efficiency of 39 percent … posted a clip of 42 percent (34-81) from beyond the arc in SoCon play, good enough for third-best in the conference … ranked top 10 in the SoCon in free throw percentage at 79.1 percent (72-91) … scored double-digit points 16 times while notching a season-high 21 against UNCG on Feb. 15 … was named the SoCon Player of the Week on Feb. 20.

Georgia Tech: Appeared in 58 games over three seasons for the Yellow Jackets … played in just two contests in 2021-22 while battling through injury … made 14 starts in 25 games played in 2020-21 … averaged 6.7 points while shooting 33 percent on threes … played in 31 games in 2019-20 … averaged 5.2 points while totaling 55 assists and 25 steals …knocked down 26 of 86 treys for an efficiency of 30 percent.

VMI: Totaled 1,125 points in two seasons for the Cadets … started and played in all 62 games … led all of the SoCon in scoring at 21.4 points per game in 2018-19, a season in which he was named to the All-SoCon Second Team … Ranked third in the conference with 3.63 three-point field goals per game, hitting 39.7 percent of his attempts … Recorded nine 30-point games on the season, becoming the first conference player to do so since Stephen Curry reached the mark 15 times in 2008-09 … earned SoCon Freshman of the Years honors in 2017-18 … averaged 14.6 points and 2.5 assists per contest.

High School: Scored 1,341 points and averaged 14.1 points per game, 2.5 rebounds per game, and 2.2 assists at Brookwood High School and finished his career as the school's #3 all-time leading scorer...was named 2016-17 Gwinnett Daily Post Player of the Year and 2016-17 Region 7 AAAAAAA Player of the Year...in 2015-16, Parham was named to the Deep South Classic All-Tournament Team and was selected second team All-Region 8 AAAAAA...in his sophomore season, Parham was tabbed Deep South Classic Most Valuable Player and the following season was named to the 2016 GACA North-South Junior All-Star game.
